availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Lemuel Cook and Margaret Cook. Anderson County resident in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Unnamed District, p. 236 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Unnamed District, p. 141; Find A Grave, "William E. Cook (1843-1909)," Memorial #65863395, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/65863395 (accessed November 9, 2017); KYR-0001-004-0031.
